effect_entries.effect: Held: Prevents the holder from evolving naturally.  Evolution initiated by the trainer (Stones, etc) will still work.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Prevents level-based evolution from occuring.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A wondrous stone
& a hold item that
prevents evolution.

A wondrous hold
item that prevents
evolution.

An item to be held by a POKéMON.
The holding POKéMON is prevented
from evolving.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
The Pokémon holding this peculiar stone
is prevented from evolving.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
The Pokémon holding this peculiar stone
is prevented from evolving.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
The Pokémon holding this peculiar stone
is prevented from evolving.

Objet à tenir. Pierre merveilleuse
empêchant l’évolution.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
The Pokémon holding this peculiar stone
is prevented from evolving.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
The Pokémon holding this peculiar stone
is prevented from evolving.

ポケモンに　もたせると
そのあいだ　しんか　しなくなる
ふしぎな　いし。

포켓몬에게 지니게 하면
지닌 동안에는 진화하지 않게 되는
이상한 돌.

Objet à tenir. Une pierre merveilleuse empêchant
l’évolution.

Ein Item, das einem Pokémon zum Tragen
gegeben werden kann. Es bewirkt einen
Entwicklungsstopp.

Fragmento de hielo que repele el calor y fortalece
los movimientos de tipo Hielo. Debe llevarlo un
Pokémon.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Chi ha questa pietra particolare evita l’evoluzione.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
A Pokémon holding this peculiar
stone is prevented from evolving.

ポケモンに　持たせると
そのあいだ　進化しなくなる
不思議な　石。

ポケモンに　もたせると
そのあいだ　しんか　しなくなる
ふしぎな　いし。

포켓몬에게 지니게 하면
지닌 동안에는 진화하지 않게 되는
이상한 돌.

攜帶後，寶可夢在此期間
不會進化的神奇石頭。

Objet à tenir. Une pierre merveilleuse empêchant
l’évolution.

Ein Item, das einem Pokémon zum Tragen gegeben
werden kann. Es bewirkt einen Entwicklungsstopp.

El Pokémon que lleva esta piedra mágica no
evoluciona.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Chi ha questa pietra particolare evita l’evoluzione.

An item to be held by a Pokémon. A Pokémon
holding this peculiar stone is prevented
from evolving.

ポケモンに　持たせると
そのあいだ　進化しなくなる
不思議な　石。

携带后，宝可梦在此期间
不会进化的神奇石头。
